js_description: Handle navigation, load featured products, manage user sessions, display live chat support, and handle promotional pop-ups.
description: The main page of the shopping website, featuring a clean and modern layout with product categories, promotional banners, and an interactive user interface. The page is designed to engage users with high-quality images, animations, and promotional offers.
practice_features: Display of featured products, navigation to different sections, interactive promotional banners, real-time chat support, animated transitions, and user-friendly navigation.
additional_features: Live chat support, promotional pop-ups, user testimonials, social media feed integration, newsletter signup form, personalized product recommendations, and seasonal sales banners.

js_description: Filter products, sort products, add to cart functionality, dynamic product listing, and quick view modal.
description: Page displaying a comprehensive list of products with advanced filtering and sorting options. Users can view detailed product information, add items to their cart, and quickly preview products.
practice_features: Product filtering, sorting options, add to cart button, dynamic product listing, quick view modal.
additional_features: Quick view modal for products, product comparison tool, user reviews and ratings, wishlist feature.

js_description: Display product details, manage image gallery, add to cart functionality, handle image zoom, and manage customer reviews.
description: This page provides an in-depth look at a single product, featuring a high-quality image gallery, detailed descriptions, customer reviews, and related products. Users can add the product to their cart, share it on social media, or add it to their wishlist.
practice_features: Image gallery, product details, customer reviews, add to cart functionality, social media sharing, wishlist addition, product comparison.
additional_features: Related products carousel, video reviews, image zoom on hover, detailed product specifications, stock status indicator.

js_description: Manage cart items, update quantities, proceed to checkout. Dynamically update the cart total as items are added or removed.
description: The shopping cart page allows users to review and modify their selected products. Users can adjust item quantities, remove items, and see the updated total cost in real-time. The layout includes a summary of cart items on the left and a detailed cost breakdown on the right, including options to apply discount codes and view estimated shipping costs.
practice_features: Cart item management, quantity update, total cost calculation, discount code application, save items for later.
additional_features: Save for later option, apply discount codes, view estimated shipping costs, move items to wishlist. Users can also see product recommendations based on the items in their cart.

js_description: Handle address input, payment processing, order review, form validation, and progress tracking.
description: This page is designed for users to complete their purchase by entering shipping details, selecting payment methods, and reviewing their order. The page is divided into three main sections: shipping details, payment information, and order summary.
practice_features: Address form with auto-complete, payment form with validation, order summary with item details, progress bar indicating checkout steps.
additional_features: Save address for future use, apply gift cards, promotional code input, different shipping options, guest checkout option, support for multiple payment methods including credit card, PayPal, and Apple Pay.

js_description: Handle user authentication, session management, input validation, and provide real-time feedback for user actions.
description: Sign-in page for users to log into their account. The page includes fields for username and password, options for social media login, and a 'Remember Me' checkbox. The layout ensures a user-friendly experience with clear input fields and error messages.
practice_features: User login, error handling, input validation, session management, real-time feedback.
additional_features: Social media login options, 'Remember Me' functionality, secure password input, responsive design for mobile and desktop, user feedback on login attempts.

js_description: Handle user registration, form validation, and interactively guide the user through the sign-up process.
description: This page allows new users to create an account by filling out a registration form. It includes fields for username, email, password, and password confirmation. The page features a clean and user-friendly layout with real-time validation feedback and helpful tooltips.
practice_features: User registration, form validation, real-time feedback, responsive design.
additional_features: Email verification, password strength meter, captcha verification, tooltips for input fields, and real-time error messaging.

js_description: Display order summary, handle post-purchase options, and provide interactive elements for user engagement.
description: Order confirmation page displaying the details of the completed purchase, including order summary, delivery information, and payment details. Users can take post-purchase actions such as viewing order details or continuing shopping.
practice_features: Display order summary, post-purchase actions, interactive buttons for receipt printing and order tracking.
additional_features: Recommendations for next purchase based on order history, estimated delivery time display, and customer support link for any issues related to the order.

js_description: Display detailed order information, handle reordering options, and provide interactive elements for tracking and support.
description: Detailed page for viewing past order information, including item details, pricing, and order status. Users can easily reorder items and track the shipping status of their orders.
practice_features: Display order details, reorder functionality, order tracking, invoice printing.
additional_features: Order tracking status with real-time updates, customer support contact options, printable invoice, estimated delivery time display.

js_description: Handle password reset via email, including form validation and secure token handling.
description: Password reset page for users to recover their account through a secure and straightforward process. Users can request a password reset link via email, and upon verification, they can set a new password.
practice_features: Password reset form with email verification, token-based validation, and secure password update.
additional_features: Security questions for additional verification, CAPTCHA to prevent automated requests, real-time validation of password strength, and email notifications for password reset requests.
